WRITING.TITLE: Where do you go in the City to watch the games?
WRITING.TEXT:
So I'm trying to convince my bosses at work to show all the Quakes game and nationally aired MLS games. Just curious if there is many other places in SF (especially around the union square area) that folks go to watch the games. I'm trying to do my part to grow the sport, and could use the community's help.
Edit: I haven't talked to the bosses yet, but I am working tonight, so if you are in the City and want a place to watch the season opener (Timbers vs Minnesota) come out to Jasper's Corner Tap Kitchen at 401 Taylor St.

WRITING.TITLE: New season almost upon us, I need a safe space.
WRITING.TEXT: With the season starting tomorrow, and all the terrible predictions from journalist I thought I'd turn to my peeps and talk realistic expectations for the season. I am highly optimistic for a playoff run. But I've also felt this brekkie each of our last four seasons.

WRITING.TITLE: STO 2 vs reworking the current system?
WRITING.TEXT:
As most of know this game is great and we love it for one reason or another. But it is also known that there are a number of bugs and issues that require fixing, but probably due to the code work makes it very difficult to get it all done, if even possible. So what is the solution? A complete overhaul? Piecemeal patch work? STO 2?
Would you want a totally revamped system but lose everything you currently have? I don't see STO 2 coming for a while, as Cryptic just launched on consoles. But would love to hear your thoughts.

WRITING.TITLE: Role as beta fleet?
WRITING.TEXT:
As we are a beta fleet, what is the best use of resource and what actions to take to maximize our efforts? I haven't been super active due to real life commitments such as 16 hour work days, but still want to do my part where I can.
P.S. Unrelated but saw a thing about becoming an adjunct (sp?) In the fleet news, what does that mean?

Easiest would be to do tour of the galaxy mission daily. Based on your ship setup and died you can get 500 - 900k (according to some). With my current deep I can knock out beta quadrant with few mistakes for about 500k.
Obviously if you are willing to drop money getting keys and what not is the quickest, but if you are taking about grinding.
Doing admiralty and doff missions work well too.
